revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: ....Just price ... for the donkey driver ... they demand ... him ... because they steal immediately..... I ask you therefore to send with Hermanias (.....) the one with the donkey, ... twenty pairs of bread(?) (cakes?) and one basket of artichokes (?) and send me phynikia. And as for the house-rent, (....for ....the lodger, what keeps you from giving her ......?);And if you have cabbage, send us eleven artabas and two drachmas for the expenditure. And if you sell the wheat, it is important to go down to the floor where the twenty artabas are. ;Give my greetings to my Aphys and my mother and everybody in the house.;Be healthy;In the 5th year of Nero, our Lord, on Jan. 9th
